description: Ah, your favorite time of day! A hot beverage, toasty fire and a captivating story refreshes your mind, body and spirit in our “Cozy Retreat” puzzle! Sit back and release the stress of the day as you piece together an enchanting scene in this “Cozy Retreat” jigsaw puzzle! It’s been a cold winter, but the fire in the stove has you warm and toasty after a challenging work day. Now you can sit back with a hot cup of tea and some sweet treats and escape into one of your favorite Jane Austen novels. And best yet, your precious kitty cat and adorable new puppy are keeping you company! Refresh your mind, body and spirit with cozy puzzle fun! This 500-piece Large Format jigsaw puzzle combines easy-to-handle, clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s perfect interlocking fit for a most pleasurable puzzling experience! With pieces 20% larger than standard, details are easy to see, so you can complete it in just a day or two. Crafted with an extra-thick backing and our linen-structured paper, the printed image is vibrant, crisp, and glare-free. Fun for ages 12 and up!
